mapper.select: SELECT REQ_DEPT_CD , PRDLN_CD , KWD_SPR , SCRNG_SPR , SCRNG_SPR AS ORG_SCRNG_SPR , KWD_NM , KWD_NM AS ORG_KWD_NM , SYN_NM , RNG , SCR , USE_YN , EMP_NO , (SELECT NM FROM PI_EMP B WHERE B.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO) AS USER_NM , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT , '0' AS CHK_DEL FROM TM_ANLYS_STD A WHERE REQ_DEPT_CD = #{req_dept_cd} AND PRDLN_CD = #{prdln_cd} AND KWD_SPR = #{kwd_spr} ORDER BY KWD_NM

SELECT REQ_DEPT_CD , PRDLN_CD , KWD_SPR , SCRNG_SPR , KWD_NM , SYN_NM , SCR , NVL2(#{syn_nm}, DECODE(SYN_NM, #{syn_nm}, '1', '0' ), '0') AS CHK_SEL FROM TM_ANLYS_STD WHERE REQ_DEPT_CD = #{req_dept_cd} AND PRDLN_CD = #{prdln_cd} AND KWD_SPR = #{kwd_spr} AND KWD_NM != #{kwd_nm} ORDER BY KWD_NM
